job.title: Lead Software Engineer (Python) ($175-225k), 100% remote
job.description: <p><strong>Lead Software Engineer, (Python), </strong>($175-225k), 100% remote.</p><p><br></p><p>ABOUT US:</p><ul><li>Fast-Growing, Disruptive SaaS in Fintech,</li><li>Silicon Valley Startup, $120M Series-B, Profitable,</li><li>Proven Industry Veteran Execs with very successful exits</li><li>Excellent Pay, Benefits, Equity, 100% remote, telecommute.</li></ul><p><br></p><p>ABOUT YOU:</p><ul><li>10+ years of Professional Backend Software Engineering</li><li>Strong Python, API Development, REST, AWS</li><li>Distributed Systems, Highly Scalable Systems,</li><li>Excellent Collaboration skills, Team Lead skills</li><li>Excited to build our core Payments Platform eventually used by millions</li></ul><p><br></p><p>Nice to have:</p><ul><li>High traffic Backend Development for Consumer Web (nice to have)</li><li>Startup experience (nice to have)</li><li>Payments Processing experience</li></ul>
